channel.title: Entertainment,More,Bollywood on TechnoStreet
channel.description: Recent content in Entertainment,More,Bollywood on TechnoStreet

item.title: SRK's motivation: One has to believe that good will always outweigh the bad
item.description: SRK’s motivation: One has to believe that good will always outweigh the bad Bollywood superstar Shah Rukh Khan has shared the mantra he practices for the problems he has faced till now.

item.title: Bollywood actors Varun Dhawan, Kriti Sanon unveil Apna Bana Le audio from Bhediya
item.description: Bollywood actors Varun Dhawan, Kriti Sanon unveil Apna Bana Le audio from Bhediya Bollywood actors Varun Dhawan and Kriti Sanon, on Saturday, unveiled the audio of the romantic track Apna Bana Le from their upcoming horror comedy film Bhediya.

item.title: Bollywood actress Anushka chooses 'best angles, photos'' to wish hubby Virat Kohli
item.description: Bollywood actress Anushka chooses ‘best angles, photos’' to wish hubby Virat Kohli Bollywood actress Anushka Sharma shared some goofy images of her husband Virat Kohli to wish him on his birthday.

item.title: Bollywood actor Kartik Aaryan's 'Freddy' ditches theatre release
item.description: Bollywood actor Kartik Aaryan’s ‘Freddy’ ditches theatre release "I feel fortunate to be a part of Freddy, the story of the film is something that I haven't explored before"
